page.title: 02 CHESTERTON FIELDS FARM
page.content: Farmer H has had his four hundred acre farm for twenty months.Before that it was a stud farm.The boy and the man who work for him have done so for twenty years and they live locally.He keeps beef cows,sheep,chickens and ponies.He also grows wheat and barley. His machines include a combine harvester,four tractors and a land rover as well as ploughs and drills.He feels that the new M40 will be a great benefit when it is built.He thinks that Chesterton is a nice village although there are no facilities for leisure activities except a neighbours tennis court.
